snippet: The swift reaction by companies in the weeks since Apple Pay was unveiled makes clear that how we normally pay for goods and services is ripe for transformation.
abstract: Apple's new payment system Apple Pay already has technology industry scrambling to profit from future in which apps could regularly replace other forms of payment; eBay's announcement that it will spin off PayPal, long dominant digital payment service, is example of how companies are trying to prepare for changes in ways consumers pay for purchases.
lead_paragraph: The swift reaction by companies in the weeks since Apple Pay was unveiled makes clear that how we normally pay for goods and services is ripe for transformation.

headline.main: As PayPal Spins Off, Apple Pay Signals New Era at Cash Register
headline.print_headline: Apple’s System Signals New Era at Cash Register
